description: Tangy slaw and succulent, spicy slow-cooked pork make for the perfect combo in these tasty sliders. Great for family dinners or a casual night in with friends.
name: SlowCooker Pork Sliders Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 Woolworths white hifibre low-gi lunch rolls

recipeInstructions.text: Discard skin from pork, then use 2 forks to roughly shred pork. Stir shredded pork through cooking juices. Transfer pork, without cooking juices, to a serving dish. Top roll bases with pork and slaw, then sandwich with rolls tops. Serve.
